articles.title: The umpires I admired - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Looking back to the days of Douglas Sang Hue, Col Egar and Charlie Elliott
articles.content: Charlie Elliott (right) didn't suffer stupidity, and was not shy of admonishing spectators  •  Central Press/Getty Images
